title: You can use external GPUs on the Raspberry Pi 5
description:
GitHub issue: https://github.com/geerlingguy/raspberry-pi-pcie-devices/issues/564

Thanks to EVERYONE who's helped along this long journey (and it's not quite over yet!). Will AMD or Nvidia—or maybe even INTEL!?—support their cards on the Pi 5 officially? Time will tell ;)

Other things mentioned in this video:

  - Pineberry Pi NVMe HAT: https://pineberrypi.com/products/hat-top-2230-2240-for-rpi5
  - Pineberry Pi uPCity: (Unavailable... I'll add a link if they make it!)
  - AMD RX 460 - more info: https://pipci.jeffgeerling.com/cards_gpu/xfx-radeon-rx460-4gb.html

Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/geerlingguy
Sponsor me on GitHub: https://github.com/sponsors/geerlingguy
